verbs.description: [V: is] the fear of food poisoning eating at you by the third visit to the pediatrician office emily stomach was tender to the touch her spleen was swollen and she was anemic according to statistics from the centers for disease control there are an estimated 76 million cases annually in the united states including 325 000 hospitalizations and 5 000 deaths i can personally recall several food - related scares hemolytic uremic syndrome eating madeleine ferrières stomachache halloween leukemia chocolate university of oregon media coverage fear emily
